title: SOLD--T200, Pittsburg, with Honus Wagner, side borders trimmed, $95
author: dougscats

posts.post_title: SOLD--T200, Pittsburg, with Honus Wagner, side borders trimmed, $95
posts.post_content:
I'm trimming down my collection, and I don't think I'll ever complete this set, so I'm putting it up for sale. 
The set of 13 below has SOLD.
all but the trimmed Pittsburgh with Wagner, which is still available for $95.

First come, first served. "I'll take it" trumps any other negotiations.

Email/Ppff [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] or pay by check. Regular paypal, buyer pays the fee.

Messages: Email me personally [i.e., not Net54-generated email, which often ends up in my Junk mail] or post here. No pm's, please, unless necessary.

Here are some other BST threads of mine with additional cards in different forums; you can combine any/all, $100 minimum order:

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=285669[/url]
19th c., Old Judge Ewing, N29 G. Miller: [url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=285699[/url]
T205: [url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=260937[/url]
T206: [url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=282864[/url]
T202 Middle Panels: [url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=265602[/url]
19th c. Woodcuts: [url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=283138[/url]
Honus Wagner for the low-budget H-o-F collector.

I'll take the Pirates  / Wagner card.
PM coming.

Thanks
Brian
